attributes.action: stop these boy racers making deliberate noise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want all the noisy cars to be stopped and made to put them back to manufactures spec.... ie wrong exhausts/ and thumping radios this is noise pollution and it don`t seem to me.. that anything is being done about it   You have done something about phones now do something about this  It`s just as dangerous

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
